p:
In literature exist
1
,
39
,
40 many studies that have reported inhibition mode or IC 50 for metabolites such as procyanidin B-type dimers, catechin, protocatechuic acid, p-hydroxybenzoic acid, against α-glucosidase and α-amylase enzymes. It is worth pointing out that each compound showed an IC 50 value higher than that shown by the MES.
